description: Great application for keeping notes in many categories.

This app brings me back to the days I used a software product called "Skwyrul". The app worked in Windows (and is still available).

I thoroughly enjoyed using CherryTree. It is very flexible and allows you to enter text (of course), images, tables and so on. The tree structure makes it easy to find information and organize it in a very rational and logical fashion.

Nice features like timed auto-save and able to choose icons etc. is highly appreciated. I highly recommend you give this app a try. Back in the days when I was working as a tech, it made my job easy using this type of SQL database system.
crash's after notes reach a certain size
the latest update does not work properly in ubuntu. I've just updated it, and it does not work. It worked perfectly before this update.
summary: the latest update does not work properly in ubuntu

description:
only advantage passwoird protected notes. 
its garbage.

If I could only have one application it would definitely be this.
You can essentially use it as a wiki for your entire life as well as a file launcher and bookmark manager. 
I'm glad that it supports encryption too.
The fact that your database exists as a single file also makes it really portable.
I think it could be improved further by automatically updating links when the target node or file has moved and I would like a fully functioning companion mobile app. I am using the one developed by a third party but it needs more work. 
A huge thanks to the developers of CherryTree for helping me organise my life!

Great app, but the snap version seems to have a lot of issues. 
Forgets preferences, doesn't keep notes open between uses, crashes when trying to import previous preferences. 
Would highly recommend installing the non-Snap version, as I have yet to have issues with it, but for some reason, it only goes up to v0.99.43; there is no update to v1.0.

While I do wish it supported markdown, I find that all the other features it has make it a superior choice for me to all the markdown notes programs that I've tried.

Every time I try to switch to a markdown based notes program (because I really want markdown), I end up switching back to Cherrytree for its power.
Forever grateful a friend of mine said he used this for school. It has given me features I badly needed for years. A literal must have for my school and diary! I use this program every single day.
Todas mis guías, notas, procesos, con código, con foto, para hacer manuales y exportar a pdf o en base de datos. Excelente aplicación. Gracias!
Appli très utile, jamais eu de souci. Merci
summary: Appli très utile, jamais eu de souci. Merci

description: Часто пользуюсь для ведения заметок, мне подошло идеально. Только не хватает поиска по нескольким слова в любом порядке (в абзаце, на странице).
Пакет хороший, но почему-то не работает переключение языка интерфейса - работаерт только английский!
Лучшее приложение для иерархических записей. Работаю в нем уже третий год. Работает идеально!
